content: note this pattern has not been tested the mwsogl cowl features an all-over moss stitch creating a beautifully warm and squishy texture perfect for snuggling up in on chilly days mwsogl is the welsh word for moss and the green in my first sample reminded me of the carpets of green moss covering every surface in my childhood home of wales the infinity cowl is worked flat from a provisional cast-on flat with a small ribbed edge before grafting the two ends together the cowl pattern is written for one size but the length can be easily adjusted from the recommended single twist to make a longer or shorter finished accessory finished circumference 150cm 60 finished height 30cm 12 size is adjustable by adding/reducing the number of row but finishing on a row 4 is recommended for the neatest grafting the pattern includes written instructions for a provisional cast-on using try-on cords and written instructions for grafting using kitchener stitch for all pattern support please contact me here on ravelry or email madebymoomeeno@gmail com
